transcript.text: If you see bribery or corruption, report it!

panelText.text: If you witness or suspect an act of bribery or corruption, you have a duty to report it.

• Tell your manager or the Law or Compliance team
  • Call or log the concern on the Johnson Controls Integrity Helpline
  • If your health, safety or liberty is threatened in connection with a demand for payment, report the threat to:
    • your manager
    • the Law department and
    • the Enterprise Security team at +1-414-524-6700 or
      email gsoc@jci.com
  • If in doubt about any aspect of bribery or corruption:
    • seek guidance from the Law or Compliance team
    • consult the Johnson Controls Anti-Corruption Policy
